name: Standard T&C
terms:
1. Price: Our Quoted Price are Firm & on Ex-works basis only. The prices are exclusive of GST and any other statuary duties imposed by Govt./State Govt. applicable at the time of execution of order and the same will be charged extra to your account.
2. Transportation: Transportation shall be arranged by you at your cost or we can despatch the materials through Associated Road Carriers Limited on "Freight To Pay" basis.
3. GST: GST will be charged Extra as per the Rate applicable at the time of supply of materials.Present Rate @18%. Our GSTN NO. 19AABFT6724F1Z4
4. Input Credit under GST: The Rates have been Quoted after taking into A/c the Input Credit available under GST Scheme. Hence any further benefit on this A/c. will not be passed on to you.
5. Offer Validity: Our offer will be Valid for 30 Days from the above date.
6. Inspection: By Consignee at your site stores only./RITES
7. Delivery: Mutually agreed at the time placement of the your technically and commercially clear Order.
8. Payment: 100% Payment with GST against Proforma Invoice at the time of despatch of materials.Our SBI Bank Current A/c. No. 11187416265 Our IFS Code No. SBIN0003681
9. LOA No.: Railway LOA No. must be mentioned in the P.O.
10. LD Clause: Any LD Clause will not be acceptable to us.
title: Standard T&C
